column1: DATASET: Greenhouse gas emissions by source sector (source: EEA) [env_air_gge]
SOURCE OF DATA: European Environment Agency (EEA)
European Union - 28 countries and Iceland under the Kyoto Protocol
Germany (until 1990 former territory of the FRG)
Greenhouse gases (CO2, N2O in CO2 equivalent, CH4 in CO2 equivalent, HFC in CO2 equivalent, PFC in CO2 equivalent, SF6 in CO2 equivalent, NF3 in CO2 equivalent)
Hydrofluorocarbones and perfluorocarbones - not specified mix (CO2 equivalent)
All sectors and indirect CO2 (excluding memo items)
All sectors and indirect CO2 (excluding LULUCF and memo items)
All sectors and indirect CO2 (excluding LULUCF and memo items, including international aviation)
All sectors (excluding LULUCF and memo items)
All sectors (excluding LULUCF and memo items, including international aviation)
Land use, land use change, and forestry (LULUCF)
